author: adityapatwardhan
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Execute BVT/DRT on latest package. 
C:\MSPCTL\PowerShell\Win8\PowerShell\legacy\TTest.exe /s HelpSearchTests
## Expected behavior

Tests pass
## Actual behavior

CmdletInvocationException while running setup for the suite. 
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v0.6.0-112-g3276846c401e0c2132cc260f89752b121c81abde
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan is this still relevant? Doesn't look needed anymore...If so, can you close it?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @joeyaiello This can be closed. This was for running full Powershell tests on PS v6.

title: BVT/DRT HelpSearchTests throw System.Management.Automation.CmdletInvocationException: Illegal characters in path.
